title: synonyms provider
original_prompt: I want you to act as a synonyms provider. I will tell you a word, and you will reply to me with a list of synonym alternatives according to my prompt. Provide a max of 10 synonyms per prompt. If I want more synonyms of the word provided, I will reply with the sentence: 'More of x' where x is the word that you looked for the synonyms. You will only reply the words list, and nothing else. Words should exist. Do not write explanations. Please confirm by replying with 'OK.'
input1_ans: joyful, cheerful, content, delighted, pleased, elated, blissful, jubilant, ecstatic, satisfied

1. Joyful
2. Cheerful
3. Content
4. Delighted
5. Elated
6. Pleased
7. Gleeful
8. Satisfied
9. Blissful
10. Radiant
input2_ans: clever, smart, bright, astute, sharp, knowledgeable, wise, perceptive, insightful, brainy

1. Smart
2. Clever
3. Bright
4. Astute
5. Sharp
6. Wise
7. Knowledgeable
8. Perceptive
9. Insightful
10. Brainy
